Title: Mind Morgue
Director: Mark Daniel, Mark Daniel Foley, Marc Dube
Writer: Mark Daniel (screenplay), Mark Daniel Foley, Michael O'Connor (screenplay), Aaron Vnuk (screenplay)
Actors: Christine Allanach, Kat Bartlett, Ashley Bates, Moses Beckett
Plot: Robert Maxwell, a passionate writer of more than thirty years is prepared to scribe his final tale. Possessed by an invasion of disturbing images, he struggles to regain control of his ...
